tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Gynae advice,Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review:
Shashikala Hande is an excellent doctor. She is very gentle and gives time to listen to your problem very patiently. She explains everything clearly leaving you 100% satisfied. She is very friendly and supportive.

*** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***** I want to thank Dr. Shashikala Hande for the help she had done to me. She used to solve concerns and provide required advices efficiently.

Dr. Shashikala Hande provided her guidance throughout my entire pregnancy phase till delivery. There was some complications which she handled very well and always used to approach positively. I was not enough confident about normal delivery due to intense labour pain. But she helped me in Normal Vaginal Delivery which was a dream come true for me. Her treatment and guidance has given me the happiness of Motherhood. Her support made my entire pregnancy journey smooth and successful. Me and my husband are blessed with baby boy and now my baby is just 1 month old and doing well. I am really happy. 
I'm eternally grateful and would like to Thank to Dr. Shashikala Hande from the bottom of my heart.
I highly recommend Dr. Shashikala for all who are planning for baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It is my pleasure to give the review about Dr. Shashikala Hande. I was in touch with her throughout my wife’s pregnancy and delivery. She is very friendly and explains everything whether she is introducing any medicine or why any new test needed to be done or any further step needed to be taken.

My wife is an IT professional. So, my wife was looking for normal vaginal delivery as other types of delivery like caesarean or forceps delivery is coming with different types of complications. I and my wife were not confident about the normal delivery, but Dr. Shashikala has given confidence to us that if no other complication happen during the later time of pregnancy like baby position or health issues then my wife can go for normal delivery.

The day my wife admitted in hospital she was asking for caesarean delivery, but Dr. Shashikala encouraged my wife and though normal delivery is painful, but my wife was able to do it.
I really appreciate Dr. Shashikala’s knowledge and experience regarding this matter.

Now I and my wife has been blessed by a baby boy where all people Dr. Shashikala, other doctors and nurse’s effort, involvement and blessings associated.

Thank you, Dr. Shashikala, for helping my wife to enter to Motherhood and me to Fatherhood phase of life. I highly and happily recommend Dr. Shashikala to the would-be parents for their parenthood journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Dr.Sashikala Mam for my wife's pregnancy. Inspite of complications associated we were blessed with a little angel last month. Special mention to Dr Sashikala, she has been extremely helpful and explains the issues/risks in detail. Ours was a high risk pregnancy with central palcenta prevaia. The doctor handled the situation very well and always adviced us through out our pregnancy. She is very coperative, friendly and a patient listener. Five star rating for excellent services provided at the hospital. If you are looking for a good maternity hospital and a well qualified doctor, don't give second thought Go for Dr. Sasikala Mam at Cloud Nine Jaynagar. Thank you Doctor for making us enter parenthood.

** **** ********** *** ******* ******** * *** ***** ***** **** *** *** *** ********* ** we're asked to consult Dr. Sasikala Hande. March 1st we consulted her telling my wife had pain in lower abdomen , she did a manual check n also a vaginal swab test said nothing to worry and it's normal gas pain. She gave rantac tablets. Friday night continues pain was there for two hrs same was the case on Saturday. Sunday again pain started increasing and night my wife suffered a lot of pain she was not able to sleep a single minute . Monday morning we immediately rushed to hospital telling Dr. Sasikala that having severe pain , I had constipation also then. So Dr said we ll go in for scan. We did scan and cervix appeared normal. So Dr gave medicine for gas n constipation again. My wife was literally crying n told she had soo much pain did not sleep for minute also. She even told she had white discharge and contraction like pain.***** *** *** *** *** ** **** ** ***** ** ** ********* We came back home thinking it was all gas n constipation pain. Monday n Tuesday passed with pain. Wednesday was the bad day which we din even imagine will happen. My wife got severe pain n we had to rush to hospital immediately in the middle of night. Her pain was so severe we were not able to cloud nine n immediately we admitted her ** *** Where the Dr concluded that my wife has got labour pain and she will deliver baby in sometime. My wife was 21 weeks only then n we delivered a preterm baby the same day. ** ******* ****** ** *** * ** *** *** **** ** ******** ****** **** **** ***** ******** ******* * ***** ***** **** *** *** ****** ** **** ** **** *** * ***** **** *** ** **** **** * *** *** ***** **** ********* **** ** **** **** *********** ** *** *** **** **** * I would request everyone to be very careful while consulting the doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Doctor was in too much hurry to examine me. She  just checked my weight and didn't even ask me symptoms thoroughly. I have been to different Gynecologists and hence, I know that certain body symptoms are very crucial for a PCOS case. That was my 'fast' and bad experience with doctor. 
Later, when I went to confirm the name of a medicine, her assistants(who appeared not at all qualified for the job. They were so clueless about everything) didn't let me in . She herself went inside and as expected, was unable to explain the name of the medicine. When I went to the medical shop, one of the medical store couldn't understand the name of the same medicine. Fortunately, one guy at another MedPlus store knew about that medicine and gave it to me. The name of the medicine was completely different to what was told to me by her assistants. 
She might me good with pregnancy cases, but I didn't find her appropriate for my case. 
Also, the google maps location is wrongly mentioned. When I called at clinic to inquire about its actual location, as expected they were unable to explain me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I've consulted Dr. Shashikala for both my pregnancies. Visited her for the 1st time, just a week before my 1st delivery. 2nd visit was on the day of delivery. Though she didn't know much abt my case, she treated me well and delivered a healthy baby thru NVD. Then i consulted her regularly for my 2nd pregnancy. On the day of delivery,I rushed into hospital arnd 7 AM with strong contractions and 7 cms dilated. She reached hospital in a very short notice (30 mins to be precise). She also notified the reception and duty doctor to send me directly to labour room and check immediately. As there was no much time, I didn't go thru preps/admission process. I delivered a healthy baby within 45 mins while my husband was still carrying out the admission formalities.
Her timely response and dedication towards work, made the entire process so smooth. If it wasn't her, I would have been in trouble! Many thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ********** ***** ** * **** **** ****** *** her treatment is beyond imagination. She tacles her patients case very well and prescribe the proper medication for all the women health related conditions. I was very happy with her behaviour towards me when I went to meet her during my tough times. She handled my case very well and I delivered a baby boy in cloud nine. Thanks to the doctor and I will always recommend her for any patients who is having complications during pregnancy and other related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** truly genuine and very experienced. I was recommended to her by my friend who had a normal vaginal delivery under the experienced guidance of Dr. Shashikala hande and although it was relatively a little late for me in the eighth month of my pregnancy to be changing doctors. But I'm glad I did and  consulted Dr. Shashikala Hande. She ensured I had a Normal delivery since everything was normal for me. Even though I was screaming in labor pain to get C section done but Dictor assured and convinced me to bear the pain and she will not do C section  unnecessarily and made me deliver my Handsome little Baby Boy through normal vaginal delivery. I'm truly grateful to her and recommend her to each and everyone who needs the specialised expertise in any gynaecological or obstetrician matter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been a patient of  Doctor  Shashikala for a long time.I approached her for the first time due to difficulty in conceiving.She diagnosed endometriosis and performed the laproscopic surgery.I had no issues during the procedure and during the recovery. Doctor was extremely patient and kind , and answered all our questions satisfactorily.When my first pregnancy became ectopic she was very supportive and quick to react . Later on I did not  have a second thought regarding the doctor for both my pregnancies.Now I am blessed with a daughter and son. I am extremely thankful for her support and her expertise. She always puts the patient first which is a rarity. And she cares the patient and their emotions a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am in my 39 week and I started visiting Dr Shashikala from my 3 rd month pregnancy. She is a fantastic doctor . Her strengths are attention to detail of your case, pleasant and smiling face always, very attentive to patients queries and most importantly empathy and ability to connect with patients.

She has never prescribed tests or supplements unnecessarily and always motivates you to find simpler solution via your diet which is very good. I am 37 years old and at no point in time I felt I may have a difficult preganancey due to my age.  

She is very practical .No sugar coating very precise. I would strongly recommend her to anyone who is visiting cloud nine jayanagar. Extremely satisfied with her consultation

review:
I am in my 39 week and I started visiting Dr Shashikala from my 3 rd month pregnancy. She is a fantastic doctor . Her strengths are attention to detail of your case, pleasant and smiling face always, very attentive to patients queries and most importantly empathy and ability to connect with patients.

She has never prescribed tests or supplements unnecessarily and always motivates you to find simpler solution via your diet which is very good. I am 37 years old and at no point in time I felt I may have a difficult preganancey due to my age.  

She is very practical .No sugar coating very precise. I would strongly recommend her to anyone who is visiting cloud nine jayanagar. Extremely satisfied with her consultation

During the start of my pregnancy I used to go to a gynic in btm who knows abt my complicacy. Despite of knowing all the case history she was not able to diagnose the problem because of which I went through a lot of pain and stress in the 1st trimester. Then we came to Dr. Shashikala and right from that day she diagnosed the actual problem, and the treatment was very helpful. She has the patience to listen to patients. Very humble and helpful. Our experience was very good with Dr.shashikala. thanks doc for helping during that period ☺

Dr.Shashikala is very patient n down to earth. Whatever small problem / pain u have she takes into consideration n explains us very well. I went into labour for 13hrs yet she was very patient n did a normal delivery to me. Because of her my pregnancy went very smooth n i am very happy with her.  I will recommend her to anyone who is looking for patient, friendly, humble doctor.

***** ****** *tries her best for normal delivery.enthusiastic and caring for her patients.very practical in her approach .if you want real advice and genuine consultation see her.she is not the type who will sit with you for hours showing you sympathy but she will definitely uplift you with right advice and suggestions which will help you in the long run.strongly recommend her !!

I love Dr Shashikala.  I consulted her throughout my pregnancy and delivery.  Initially I was a bit apprehensive, but she seemed sincere and I decided to continue with her.  I had my delivery at Rainbow hospital. The only thing I liked about that hospital is her.  She is a lovely doctor.  Though it may seem that she gives so many tests but it's all for our good only.  Apart from that,  I was having cholestasis and she handled it very well. Thanks to her everything is fine.

She is an amazing human being and an excellent doctor. I consulted her during my pregnancy and had a great experience. She is very cautious and sometimes might ask you to undergo some tests or scans repeatedly to make sure that you and your little one is doing fine. She is very calm, have lots of patience to answer your questions even the silly ones. I will strongly recommend her.

Please never think you will meet her on time.. Once you book the appointment. They will not value your time and ask you to wait for half an hour. No priority for advance appointments as well.   Didn't meet her as well. Very disappointing as I had other appointments later

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I strongly recommend this doctor. She is very cool and quiet particular on diet plan. Unnecessarily doesn't suggest us to undergo surgery and counsel us to wait and concieve naturally, very rare quality of doctors now a days... Amazing doctor.. thank you so much doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
The very thought of hospitalization is scary and traumatizing...
 But caring doctors like you make it friendly and pleasing. Thanks *** **** ********* ******** *** ********** ***** I would never have been able to continue living a life of bliss... thank you doc

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It was too bad experience for me. Doctor didnt give me sufficient time; ***** ** ****** ********** just within 5 minutes wrote some test and asked me if I have any further queries.
She didnt explain anything regarding my problem based on her experience just said that once I get test done then only she would see.

Hey there.
I ,in very quick and easy words would like to appreciate Dr.Shashika for her easy and smooth way of delivering her words which reaches the mind in very beautiful way.

Thank you for being so relevant and easygoing,will definitely recommend others for her consultations for all the miracles which undergo .

High Regards.

My experience with Dr.hande has been extraordinary . she is one gynaec whom I actually refer like the GOD I pray. She looked after me n my unborn baby so meticulously n wonderfully that I feel it was best phase of my life. Cheers to her. Definitely recommend her for preggie.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had the following problems with this doctor:
1. She arrived 1 hour late to the practo appointment time.
2. She keeps the door open while consulting - for example, we could hear her tell the patient before us **** *** **** *** *** ****** *** *** ******* We felt that was a complete violation of privacy.*** *** ****** ** ***** ******** ** * *** ***** ******* **** ** *********** ** ******* ** *** ********* 
4. It did not feel like she cared for the patients.. *** ********** *** ****** ************** It felt a bit disappointing.
5. The doctor does not have an ultrasound scan machine inside her office and sent us down the street in a crowded public diagnostics center for the first ultrasound scan. *** **** *** ******* ***** *** *** **** * ***** *** ************ **** *** **** ***** ******* **** *** ****** *** **** 

Overall a very bad experience and would not recommend this doctor (at least not in this location) *** ********* ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is understanding and up to date with all gynae related problems. She has a modern approach and understands that women have a career to make & that they have a choice about when they want to start a family. She doesn’t pressure you to marry and start making babies like how other gynaes do. She understands endometriosis well and knows her treatments. I ve stage 3 endometriosis & I’m fortunate to be treated by her. I have been consulting her for over 2 years and I couldn’t be happier.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I had been to the doctor 4 months ago for pcos issue. And was asked to go through blood test and scanning.. after which was prescribed with few medicines.. 
Was asked to visit after 4 months.. and it happened that she started shouting at me when i said have taken medicines for 4 months and there is no much progress.. and instead of being a support she said i would get diabetes coz of weight and was prescribed with anti daibetic medications for the next 8 months.. she was so rude *** ******** ***** ********Did tell her that have been following everything that was told even with exersice there is no improvement.. was asked to consult dietitian and not return to her until i have wieght loss.. 
Totally understand that weight is a concerns.. *** ** * ****** ***** ** * *** ** ****** *** **** ***** ******

We visited the doctor for my wife regarding frequent urge for urination, uti infection. On the first meet the doc prescribed urine culture tests for both of us which came out to be negative. ***** **** *** *** ******** *** *** ** **** ** ** **** ***** ** *** **** ***** *** started referring us to urogynecologist (for the same problem for which we consulted Dr Shashikala) and to physician(as bp was a bit high 140/100). ** ** ******* *** ***** ** * **** *** ** ********* ******* ****** *** *** ********** ** *** ***** *** *** ***** ****** * ***** ********* **** *** ** *******The receptionist does not understand English well and on call she said the free follow up is only till 1 day after consultation but when I visited the clinic she said it is upto 3 days after consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today I had appointment with Mrs:Shashikala Hande,I am not at all happy with her way of attending the patient,*** ****** **** ** *********she was in hurry, ****** ******** **** ******* ******** ** ***I had huge low abdomen pain since 12 days,*** ** **** *** ********as a doctor she has perform number of tests based on patients problems,she just sent me for test,after taking test reports I roamed floor to floor with my hubby no one was there to explain the report.. Utterly disappointed with Cloudnine Hospitality n specially Dr Hande.

My  experience is satisfactory as my periods didn't come on time.so she had given me regesterone to have periods but the day I started having it, I started feeling dizzy and weak. That I told her in my second visit. But she had not given any medicine also my BP was low although my periods has started but mean while I am having a very low BP along with weakness n dizziness.  I am consulting a new doctor now.

Very much satisfy 
 Doctor is so friendly 
On my birthday she hug me, she gave chocolate and wishes me

review: She is a very nice and professional Dr ,I have been visiting her since 4years .I love the way she explains listening all ur problems.
She is very sweet and down to earth person. Very caring. She listens to all our concerns with patience and answers all our questions. Through out my pregnancy I felt that I was in good hands.

She is indeed patient, listens and notes down everything you say. She made sure that I was well assisted.
